Name: Unclear Requirements
Description: Ambiguous or changing requirements cause confusion and rework

Name: Tight Deadlines
Description: Aggressive sprint goals and deadlines lead to time pressure

Name: Overload
Description: Excessive workload, tasks, or responsibilities cause burnout

Name: Lack of Autonomy
Description: Micromanaging or restrictive processes limit creativity and decision-making

Name: Poor Communication
Description: Inadequate or unclear communication leads to misunderstandings

Name: Context Switching
Description: Frequent task switching or interruptions disrupt focus

Name: Technical Debt
Description: Neglected code quality, refactoring, or testing lead to future problems

Name: Unrealistic Expectations
Description: Stakeholder expectations exceed team's capabilities or sprint goals

Name: Lack of Feedback
Description: Insufficient or delayed feedback hinders progress and improvement

Name: Team Dynamics
Description: Conflicts, lack of trust, or poor collaboration affect team performance

Name: Sprint Planning Issues
Description: Inadequate planning, estimation, or commitment lead to sprint failures

Name: Stakeholder Interference
Description: External pressures, requests, or changes disrupt sprint progress

Name: Burnout
Description: Prolonged stress, overwork, or lack of work-life balance affects well-being

Name: Lack of Resources
Description: Insufficient tools, training, or support hinder progress

Name: Unclear Roles
Description: Confusion about team members' roles, responsibilities, or expectations
